Reviews.Title: Power loss and picture blurry!
Reviews.Author: Kolbe
Reviews.Content: I connect it to hook up one of our CCTV camera over 100ft long and the picture is ok; but I when I hook up other cameras over 200ft long and the pictures are so blurry and power loss often. The price was cheaper than everywhere but its quality is poor.Do not purchase this cheap quality wire which power loss and video picture blurry.

ProductInfo.Features:
1000 ft RG59 Siamese Cable CCTV Video & Power UL Listed
Individual video, power jackets within main jacket
1000FT Spool, RG59: 20AWG. 95% braid ensures.Power: 18/2AWG
Runs both video and power in one cable
Good quality for shorter distances and lower cost CCTV and security camera installations
ProductInfo.Name: 1000 Feet Spool Power Video Cable RG59/18/2 Siamese Cable Wide Cord RG59 18 Guage for CCTV Home Security Camera
